name: No Avoid
desc: Unit cannot avoid attacks.

name: CantoStairs
desc: Allows unit to move remaining movement after using stairs

name: Canto
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed.

name: Steal+
desc: Can steal items and unequipped weapons from enemies with lower speed.

name: Thief's Expertise
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed, unlock doors and chests without keys, see more in Fog of War, and gain more EXP when visiting houses and villages.

name: Crit +30
desc: Grants +30 critical rate.

name: Crit +15
desc: Grants +15 critical rate.

name: Refresh
desc: Let an ally act again.

name: NoTrade
desc: Cannot trade with this unit.

name: Transform
desc: Shift between anthropomorphic and bestial forms.

name: Shrapnel
desc: When using a Ballista, all enemies adjacent to the target also take damage.

name: Nightvision
desc: Grants +3 tiles of vision in Fog of War.

name: Reckless Shield
desc: If unit is injured, takes -(10% Max HP) damage.

name: Astra <red>(Class)</>
desc:
When activated, strikes five times consecutively.
Usable 3 times per chapter.

name: Astra
desc: Strikes five times consecutively.

name: Sol <red>(Class)</>
desc:
When activated, heals half damage dealt.
Usable 3 times per chapter.

name: Sol
desc: Heals half damage dealt.

name: Impale <red>(Class)</>
desc:
When activated, quadruples damage dealt.
Usable 3 times per chapter.

name: Impale
desc: Quadruples damage dealt.

name: Colossus <red>(Class)</>
desc:
When activated, adds Con to damage dealt.
Usable 3 times per chapter.

name: Colossus
desc: Adds Con to damage dealt.

name: Poisoned
desc: Lose 10% of max HP per turn and take +3 more damage during combat for five turns.

name: Resist+
desc: Grants additional RES.

name: Folia's Grace
desc: Heals 10% of Max HP each turn.

name: Transformed
desc: Grants STR +12, SKL +12, DEF +15, RES +20.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Take half damage but inflicts -2 SPD.

name: Stunned
desc: Unit cannot act.

name: Sleep
desc: Unit is asleep.

name: Petrify
desc: Unit is petrified. Cannot avoid enemy attacks and suffers Avo -30.

name: Silence
desc: Unit cannot use magic.

name: Berserk
desc: Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

name: Charmed
desc: Unit is confused. Will side with opposite team when cured.

name: Charmed
desc: Unit is confused.

name: Torch
desc: Grants increased sight range in fog of war. Bonus sight range decreases per turn.

name: Void Curse
desc: No EXP gained for attacking this unit.

name: EXP Curse
desc: No EXP or WEXP gained for attacking this unit.

name: Raised Morale
desc: Grants +2 to all stats except HP until the end of the chapter.

name: EclipseHelper
desc: Tricks the AI into using Eclipse by making it so it inflicts a hidden negative status effect on the target

name: DevilAxe
components: 'Medea' not in unit.tags and 'Foliaga' not in unit.tags and 'Merin' not in unit.tags and 'Fueg' not in unit.tags and 'Oreg' not in unit.tags and 'Circ' not in unit.tags and 'Shifter' not in unit.tags

name: ArenaDurability
desc: Prevents weapon durability from decreasing in the Arena.

name: Spy's Dagger
desc: Inflicts Def/Res -3.

name: Spy's Dagger
desc: Grants Def/Res +3.

name: Range +1
desc: Increases range by 1.

name: Vantage
desc: Allows unit to attack first.

name: BallistaUse
desc: Allows unit to use Bows when using a Ballista (For Chapter 17x)

name: Pass
desc: Unit can pass through enemy units.

name: LightOverride
desc: (Lets the Light Brand count as Light magic damage at range.)

name: AnimaOverride
desc: (Lets Anima magic swords count as Anima magic damage at range.)

name: DarkOverride
desc: (Lets Anima magic swords count as Anima magic damage at range.)

name: Inspiration
desc: Allies within three spaces deal Dmg +2 and take 2 less Dmg.

name: Inspired <blue>(Krista)</>
desc: Deals Dmg +2 and takes Dmg -2.

name: Instructor's Assist
desc: Grants Def +3 to allies within three spaces. Allows unit to use Mercy.

name: Instructor's Assist
desc: Grants Def +3 to allies within three spaces. Allows unit to use Mercy.

name: Assisted <blue>(Forrest)</>
desc: Grants Def +3.

name: <white>Mercy</>
desc: Leaves the target with 1 HP if the user's attack would kill the target.

name: Mercy
desc: Leaves the target with 1 HP if the user's attack would kill the target.

name: Mercy
desc: Leaves the target with 1 HP if the user's attack would kill the target.

name: Underhanded
desc: When against an injured foe, unit gains Avo +15 and unit attacks first.

name: White Lightning
desc: Heals half damage dealt when using thunder magic.

name: Swift Aura
desc: Grants Skl/Spd +3 to allies within three spaces.

name: Swift Aura <blue>(Chell)</>
desc: Grants Skl/Spd +3.

name: Strength Aura
desc: Grants Str +5 to allies within three spaces.

name: Strength Aura <blue>(Sam)</>
desc: Grants Str +5.

name: Live to Serve
desc: When unit heals an ally, unit recovers half the HP restored.

name: Lone Wolf
desc: Grants Dmg +3 when not adjacent to an ally.

name: Striketaker
desc: Grants a stacking buff of Dmg +2 to the user after defeating a foe. (Max. +8)

name: Striketaker <blue>(Status)</>
desc: Deal Dmg +2 per stack.

name: Defender
desc: Takes Dmg -2 for each ally adjacent to unit. This buff is passed onto all adjacent allies.

name: Defended <blue>(Alex)</>
desc: Takes Dmg -2 for each ally adjacent to Alex.

name: Rally Guard
desc: All adjacent allies take 5 less damage for one turn.

name: Rallied <blue>(Lucy)</>
desc: Takes 5 less damage.

name: Close and Personal
desc: If attacking at melee range, unit deals Dmg +5.

name: Distant Fighter
desc: If attacking from 3 or more spaces away, unit deals Dmg +5.

name: Renewal
desc: Restores 20% of Max HP at the start of each turn.

name: Cat-like Tread
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Fortress Aura
desc: Grants Def/Res +3 to allies within three spaces.

name: Fortress Aura <blue>(Viola)</>
desc: Grants Def/Res +3.

name: Hastening Dance
desc: Let all adjacent allies act again and grants them +1 Mov for one turn.

name: Hastened <blue>(Marina)</>
desc: Grants +1 Mov for one turn.

name: Heavy Hitter
desc: Adds weapon Wt/2 to Dmg.

name: Spectrum Dance
desc: Let all adjacent allies act again and grants them +2 to all stats except HP, Con, and Mov for one turn.

name: Spectrum <blue>(Azure)</>
desc: Grants +2 in all stats except HP and Mov for one turn.

name: Mageblade
desc: Grants unit Mag +5 when using a magic sword.

name: Armsthrift
desc:
Proc. Luk%:
Weapon durability does not decrease.

name: Immobilize
desc: When activated, inflicts Hit -10 onto the unit and stuns the target on hit for one turn.

name: Immobilize
desc: When activated, gives Hit -10 to unit and stuns the target for one turn on hit.

name: Futuresight
desc: Grants Hit/Avo +10.

name: Motivation
desc: If within 3 spaces of an ally, grants +10 critical rate to unit.

name: Savior
desc: Unit ignores penalties when rescuing an ally.

name: Inferno
desc: When using Fire magic, enemies within one space of the target also get damaged.

name: Charisma
desc: Grants allies within three spaces Hit/Avo +15.

name: Charisma <blue>(Ryuuji)</>
desc: Grants Hit/Avo +15

name: Gamble
desc: When activated, grants Crit +20 and Hit -10 to unit for one round of combat.

name: Gamble
desc: When activated, grants Crit +20 and Hit -10 to unit for one round of combat.

name: Globetrotter
desc: Grants Mov +1 when on an outdoor tile.

name: Heroism
desc: If unit defeats a ruffian or Dark magic user on player phase, unit can act again. Activates once per turn.

name: Heroism
desc: (Global Event 'Heroism' checks if this skill is added onto Taichi to determine whether or not to play the map animation.)

name: Strike Aura
desc: Grants Str/Mag +3 to allies within three spaces.

name: Strike Aura <blue>(Lin)</>
desc: Grants Str/Mag +3.

name: Magic Aura
desc: Grants Mag +5 to allies within three spaces.

name: Magic Aura <blue>(Tsurugi)</>
desc: Grants Mag +5.

name: Allure
desc: Male allies within 3 spaces deal Dmg +3.

name: Allured  <blue>(Yumi)</>
desc: Deals Dmg +3.

name: Flame Cutter
desc: When fully charged, unit deals Dmg +10 and targets lowest of the target's Def/Res for one round of combat.

name: Deliverer
desc: Grants Mov +2 when rescuing another unit. Unit ignores rescue penalties.

name: Rose Guard
desc: Female allies within 3 spaces of unit take 3 less damage.

name: Guarded <blue>(Yukino)</>
desc: Takes 3 less damage.

name: Philanderer
desc: If within three spaces of a female ally, unit deals Dmg +3 and takes 3 less damage.
components: any([u for u in game.get_player_units() if utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, u.position) <= 3 and 'Female' in u.tags])

name: Prayer
desc: Effects from staves affect the target and adjacent allied units of the target.

name: Wary Fighter
desc: Nullifies the ability to make follow-up attacks for both the unit and the target.

name: Disarm
desc: When activated, grants Hit +10. Neither unit nor target can make a follow-up attack. If unit hits, target cannot use items until the start of their next turn.

name: Disarm
desc: Grants Hit +10. Neither unit nor target can make a follow-up attack. If unit hits, target cannot use items until the start of their next turn.

name: Disarmed <blue>(Asuka)</>
desc: Unit cannot use items.

name: Wrath
desc: Grants Crit +20 when unit is at or below 50% Max HP.

name: Rally Strike
desc: Grants Dmg +5 to all adjacent allies for one turn.

name: Rallied <blue>(Tsubaki)</>
desc: Grants Dmg +5

name: Intimidation
desc: Inflicts Hit -15 to all enemies within three spaces of unit.

name: Intimidated <blue>(Judah)</>
desc: Hit -15.

name: Prey Mark
desc: A chosen enemy within 1 to Skl/2 spaces will be inflicted with Hit -20 if not in combat with the unit for three turns. (Usable once per turn. Unit may attack, but may not move after use.)

name: Marked <blue>(Shula)</>
desc: Hit - 20 when not in combat with Shula.

name: Wild Magic
desc: Grants +5 to either Mag, Skl, Spd, Luk, Def, or Res or +10 to either Hit, Avo, or Crit at the start of each turn.

name: Wild Magic
desc: Grants {v:kirazSkillDesc}.

name: Authority
desc: Grants all allied units Hit/Avo +5 for each enemy this unit kills. (Max. Hit/Avo +25)

name: Authority
desc: Hit/Avo +5

name: Authority <blue>(Ervan)</>
desc: Hit/Avo +5 per stack.

name: High Ground
desc: Gains Avo +30 when in combat against non-flying units.

name: Long Stride
desc: All accessible terrain has a movement cost of 1.

name: Ritual Summon
desc: Summons a phantom in exchange for 1000G and an optional weapon from the unit's inventory. The phantom will wield the chosen weapon (or an Iron Axe if none chosen) and will be the same level as the unit. Only one phantom can be summoned at a time.

name: Rampart
desc: Allies at or below 50% Max HP and within three spaces of the unit take 10 less damage.

name: Rampart <blue>(Estoc)</>
desc: Takes Dmg -10.

name: Reposition
desc: Shifts the target to the empty tile behind the unit.

name: Lethality
desc:
Proc: Skl/4%
Instantly defeat foe.

name: Holy Blood
desc:
Grants Crit +20.
Proc. Skl/2%:
Allows unit to perform two consecutive attacks.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Triangle Attack
desc: If two other armed allies with this skill are the same distance as unit from the enemy and unit initiates combat, grants unit Hit/Crit +30. Activates once per turn.
components: mode == 'attack' and ((utils.calculate_distance(target.position, game.get_unit('Chell').position) == 1 and utils.calculate_distance(target.position, game.get_unit('Viola').position) == 1 and utils.calculate_distance(target.position, game.get_unit('Lin').position) == 1) or (utils.calculate_distance(target.position, game.get_unit('Chell').position) == 2 and utils.calculate_distance(target.position, game.get_unit('Viola').position) == 2 and utils.calculate_distance(target.position, game.get_unit('Lin').position) == 2)) and game.get_unit('Chell').get_weapon() and game.get_unit('Viola').get_weapon() and game.get_unit('Lin').get_weapon()

name: Paragon
desc: Doubles experience earned.

name: Shove
desc: If unit's CON + 2 >= ally's CON, move ally one space away from unit.

name: Justice Squad
desc: If within 3 spaces of another ally with this skill, grants unit +20 Hit/Avo. (Does not stack.)

name: Justice Squad <purple>Special</>
desc: Grants +20 Hit/Avo.

name: Anticrit
desc: Grants immunity to critical hits.

name: Merin's Shell
desc: Immune to critical hits. Merin bloodline takes 5 less damage.

name: FiliShield
desc: Immune to effective damage against flying units.

name: Silver Card
desc: Reduces shop prices by half.

name: Philanderer
desc: If within three spaces of a female ally, unit gains Dmg +3 and takes Dmg -3.

name: Axebreaker
desc: Grants +50 Avo and +50 Hit when against foes wielding axes.

name: Null Follow Up
desc: Nullifies the ability to make follow-up attacks for both the unit and the target.

name: Lancefaire
desc: Grants Dmg +5 when using a lance.

name: Full Force
desc: If unit's HP == 100%, grants Dmg +10.

name: DEBUG
desc: DEBUG

name: Immunity
desc: Unit is immune to negative status effects.

name: Invincible
desc: Unit is immune to all damage.

name: Instakill
desc: Debug skill
